page.title: 03SMALL SHOPS BISHOPBRIGGS
page.content: {SMALL SHOPS - usually sited in groups. Customers said they liked the personal service and most came every day. Amongst the shops we visited were: { {Briggs Baby World }Sells baby clothes and accessories, and wool. Wool is most in demand. Business depends on weather - people come out on good days {Bookpoint }The most popular sales are Scottish books and children's books. { {Icicle }Frozen food shop. Most popular item is frozen chips. {Mohammed's Mini Market}Open 9.00 a.m. to 9.00 p.m. Stock mainly food but most in demand is cigarettes. {Pars Bakery }Favorite items Danish pastries, strawberry tarts. All foods come from own bakery in Possil Park. Average number customers 300 per day. {Forbes Chemist.}Sells medicines, hair ornaments, toiletries. Most customers go in with medical prescriptions.
